ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] brass skill
ygData.msgSnippet: Try the same wall the tunnel is on in East Commons, but up on top right before you get to the desert leading into east freeport.  There is a huge flat spot up
ygData.messageBody:
Try the same wall the tunnel is on in East Commons, but up on top right
before you get to the desert leading into east freeport. There is a huge
flat spot up there that no one ever seems to visit

Mike Mott
BPE COC Support Team
Cherokee 2030
